name: class-change
description: A collection of helpers for changing class names and delegating class change events
author: John Hildenbiddle

scripts.build:dev: mkdir -p dist/ && browserify index.js -s classList > dist/class-change.js
scripts.build:min: mkdir -p dist/ && browserify -g uglifyify index.js -s classList > dist/class-change.min.js
scripts.build: npm run build:dev && npm run build:min
